import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const InputComponent=()=>{const[userInput,setUserInput]=useState('');const[shortUrl,setShortUrl]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState('');// New state variable for error handling
